analyzed: gos bzo ba dang tshem bu mkhan // dung mkhan dang ni drung 'bud pa //
translated: The one who makes clothes, the one who sews,🔽The conch maker, the one who blows the conch,

original: zangs mkhan dang ni grangs mgar ba //
analyzed: zangs mkhan dang ni grangs mgar ba //
translated: The copper smith, the iron smith,

original: gser mkhan dang ni gser byed pa //
analyzed: gser mkhan dang ni gser byed pa //
translated: The goldsmith, the one who works with gold,

original: gser bzo ba dang gser mgar dang // goonydzi k'a dang dmar ba can //
analyzed: gser bzo ba dang gser mgar dang // goonydzi k'a dang dmar ba can //
translated: The goldsmith, the goldsmith, the one who lives on the Gõñjîka, the one who lives on the red,

analyzed: mushti kas 'tsho zla bas 'jug / nor bu byed dang bee ka ti //
translated: The one who lives on the muștika, the one who lives on the moon, the one who makes jewels, the one who makes the veka,

original: ko ranggas 'tsho bkra ba byed //
analyzed: ko ranggas 'tsho bkra ba byed //
translated: The one who lives on the koraṅga, the one who makes the colorful,

original: ri mo can dang ri mo byed //🔽kha dog spyod pa to li ka /
analyzed: ri mo can dang ri mo byed // kha dog spyod pa to li ka /
translated: The one with lines, the one who makes lines,🔽The one who practices colors, the one who makes the tōlikā,

original: phra mo go chas 'tsho bungs chags //
analyzed: phra mo go chas 'tsho bungs chags //
translated: The one who lives on fine armor, the one who is full,

original: mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan //
analyzed: mtshon cha mkhan dang ral gri mkhan //
translated: The one who makes weapons, the one who makes swords,

original: lcags bzo ba dang lcags mgar ba //
analyzed: lcags bzo ba dang lcags mgar ba //
translated: The blacksmith and the ironsmith,

original: ba ru ti byed b'a ru ni //🔽ka lya b'a la btung ba 'tsho //
analyzed: ba ru ti byed b'a ru ni // ka lya b'a la btung ba 'tsho //
translated: the one who makes flutes and the one from Vārāṇasī,

original: chang tshong ma dang chang ma'o //
analyzed: chang tshong ma dang chang ma'o //
translated: the one who drinks liquor and the liquor seller,🔽the one who sells liquor and the one who drinks liquor.

analyzed: sbrang chang tshong ma go l'i dang // mtshams can chu yi g-yon pa can //
translated: The one who sells honey-beer, the one who drinks from a skull-cup, the one who drinks from the left,

original: grong dpon dang ni mtho ris grags //
analyzed: grong dpon dang ni mtho ris grags //
translated: the one who is the head of the village and the one who is famous in heaven,

original: n'a bi ta dang mthar gnas pa //
analyzed: n'a bi ta dang mthar gnas pa //
translated: the one who is from the land of nāgas and the one who lives in the end,

original: 'dreg mkhan / skra mkhan zla ba can //
analyzed: 'dreg mkhan / skra mkhan zla ba can //
translated: the barber, the one with a moon-shaped mole,

original: sen mo gcod dang batp'am'i bu //
analyzed: sen mo gcod dang batp'am'i bu //
translated: the one who cuts nails and the one who is the son of a prostitute,

original: tho ba can dang k'oo ri ka / snod spyad 'dren dang snod spyad pa //
analyzed: tho ba can dang k'oo ri ka / snod spyad 'dren dang snod spyad pa //
translated: the one with a hammer, the one from Kaurīka, the one who carries dishes, the one who uses dishes,

original: zla 'dzin grong dbang gcod pa'o /🔽17 / shing mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog pa //🔽shing rta byed dang shing 'jog mkhan //
analyzed: zla 'dzin grong dbang gcod pa'o / 17 / shing mkhan shing bzo shing 'jog pa // shing rta byed dang shing 'jog mkhan //
translated: the one who holds the moon, the one who rules the village, and the one who cuts off.🔽The carpenter, the one who makes wooden objects, the one who stores wood,🔽the one who makes chariots, the one who stores wood,

original: phya mkhan dang ni shing khyim mkhan //
analyzed: phya mkhan dang ni shing khyim mkhan //
translated: the one who makes felt, the one who makes wooden houses,

original: khyim gnas dang ni bza' mi'o //🔽tshos ma dang ni btso blag mkhan //
analyzed: khyim gnas dang ni bza' mi'o // tshos ma dang ni btso blag mkhan //
translated: the one who lives in a house, and the one who has a wife.🔽The one who dyes, the one who is a washerman,

original: tsha ba dang ni yas phur can //
analyzed: tsha ba dang ni yas phur can //
translated: the one who is hot, and the one who has a goiter.

original: gzhu bu mal ha r'i dang // srang ba sbyangs dang tshos byed pa //
analyzed: gzhu bu mal ha r'i dang // srang ba sbyangs dang tshos byed pa //

original: lham nag byed dang lham mkhan dang // ko pags mkhan dang ku ru ta //🔽zho shas 'tsho dang las byed pa //
analyzed: lham nag byed dang lham mkhan dang // ko pags mkhan dang ku ru ta // zho shas 'tsho dang las byed pa //
translated: The maker of black shoes, the shoemaker, the currier, the maker of sandals,🔽The merchant, the artisan,

original: gla pa dang ni gla yis 'tsho //
analyzed: gla pa dang ni gla yis 'tsho //
translated: The servant, the mercenary,

original: gla za bang chen 'phrin pa dang // @151b khur pa dang ni khur 'dren pa //
analyzed: gla za bang chen 'phrin pa dang // @151b khur pa dang ni khur 'dren pa //

original: shoobhi ka dang mig 'phrul ba //
analyzed: shoobhi ka dang mig 'phrul ba //

original: na bha shra ma dbang po'i rta //
analyzed: na bha shra ma dbang po'i rta //

original: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma mkhan //🔽ngan g-yo ba dang slu byed pa //🔽sgyu ma byed dang dga' byed pa //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang sgyu ma mkhan // ngan g-yo ba dang slu byed pa // sgyu ma byed dang dga' byed pa //
translated: The conjurer, the conjurer’s wife,🔽The deceiver, the cheat,🔽The actor, the dancer,

original: byed pa sbyor dang kham smra ba //
analyzed: byed pa sbyor dang kham smra ba //
translated: The one who is engaged, the one who speaks with his mouth full,

original: lha yis 'tsho dang lha bzo ba //
analyzed: lha yis 'tsho dang lha bzo ba //
translated: The one who lives by the gods, the maker of images of the gods,

original: 'byung ba las skyes tshangs pa mkha' //
analyzed: 'byung ba las skyes tshangs pa mkha' //
translated: The one born from the elements, the brahmin of space,

original: tshangs pa las byung lha bram ze //
analyzed: tshangs pa las byung lha bram ze //
translated: The one born from Brahmā, the divine brahmin,

original: rnga pa dang ni rnga brdung ba //
analyzed: rnga pa dang ni rnga brdung ba //
translated: The drummer, the one who beats the drum,

original: lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rdeg / gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud //
analyzed: lag pa'i sgra dang thal mo rdeg / gling bu ba dang gling bu 'bud //
translated: The one who makes sounds with his hands, the one who claps, the one who plays the flute, the one who blows the flute,

original: pi wang pa dang pi wang mkhan //
analyzed: pi wang pa dang pi wang mkhan //
translated: The one who plays the lute, the one who plays the vīṇā,

original: 'tsho ba'i tha chad bya shor ba //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'i tha chad bya shor ba //
translated: The lowest of the living is the butcher.

original: de nyid lam du 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid lam du 'dren pa'o //
translated: He is led along the path.

original: ra rdzi dang ni ra skyong ba //🔽rngon pa / snyi pa /
analyzed: ra rdzi dang ni ra skyong ba // rngon pa / snyi pa /
translated: The goat-herder and the goat-keeper,🔽The hunter, the trapper,

original: bshan pa / lings //🔽sha 'tshong ba dang sha gcod pa //
analyzed: bshan pa / lings // sha 'tshong ba dang sha gcod pa //
translated: The butcher, the fowler,🔽The seller and the cutter of meat,

original: gang zhig skam pa'i sha 'tshong ba //
analyzed: gang zhig skam pa'i sha 'tshong ba //
translated: He who sells dried meat,

original: de ni sha bskams can yin no //
analyzed: de ni sha bskams can yin no //
translated: He is the dried-meat man.

original: shan pa ri dags gsod pas 'tsho //
analyzed: shan pa ri dags gsod pas 'tsho //
translated: The butcher lives by killing deer,

original: rngon pa dang ni lings pa'o //🔽a'a she di ka ri dags 'dzin //
analyzed: rngon pa dang ni lings pa'o // a'a she di ka ri dags 'dzin //
translated: The hunter and the trapper.🔽The āśīka is the deer-catcher,

original: ri dags rgya dang 'dra ba can //🔽'deng byed / gsod byed /
analyzed: ri dags rgya dang 'dra ba can // 'deng byed / gsod byed /
translated: He who is like a deer-trap.🔽The killer, the murderer,

original: stong byed dang // dya stri /
analyzed: stong byed dang // dya stri /
translated: The destroyer, the woman,

original: ri dags dra ba'o //
analyzed: ri dags dra ba'o //
translated: The deer-net.

original: aa tsoo da nama'a khe ta //
analyzed: aa tsoo da nama'a khe ta //
translated: The aśvaka and the makhāka,

original: ri dags sdig pa gnyis kyang ngo //
analyzed: ri dags sdig pa gnyis kyang ngo //
translated: The deer-sinners, the two.

original: aunma na dang 'dab can brtsegs //🔽b'i ta sastu nye bar byed //
analyzed: aunma na dang 'dab can brtsegs // b'i ta sastu nye bar byed //
translated: The unmana, the pakṣa, the stambhaka,🔽The vetas, the tāsa, the upas,

original: bya dang ri dags 'ching ba'o //
analyzed: bya dang ri dags 'ching ba'o //
translated: The bird-catcher and the deer-catcher.

original: daksh'i n'a ka bsnun pa nyid //
analyzed: daksh'i n'a ka bsnun pa nyid //
translated: The dakṣiṇāka is the stabber,

original: de ni ri dags g-yas rmas can //
analyzed: de ni ri dags g-yas rmas can //
translated: He is the deer-stabber.

original: a'a khe ta dang 'ching ba dang // zhags pa dang ni shu ram bha /
analyzed: a'a khe ta dang 'ching ba dang // zhags pa dang ni shu ram bha /
translated: pāśa, and śṛṅgabha.

original: rgyud can / shu mba /
analyzed: rgyud can / shu mba /
translated: Sūtra, śambha,

original: thag pa dang // mri shub t'i gu ni 'o //
analyzed: thag pa dang // mri shub t'i gu ni 'o //
translated: rajjū, and mṛṣṭaguna.

original: phal pa // dman pa /
analyzed: phal pa // dman pa /
translated: Pārśva, hīna,

original: ngan rigs dang // dzal ma cig shos so so skyes //
analyzed: ngan rigs dang // dzal ma cig shos so so skyes //
translated: durbhikṣa, and jālamātra.🔽Pārśva, hīna, and anārya,

original: ngan pa dmangs rigs ris med dang // khol dang byed pas gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ngan pa dmangs rigs ris med dang // khol dang byed pas gnas pa'o //
translated: dāsa, and karma-sthāna.🔽Dāsa, dāsa, and bhṛtya,🔽hired hand, and citraka,🔽messenger, and messenger, and hidden,

original: bran dang 'bangs dang g-yog po dang // gla mi dang ni tsi tra ka / mngag gzhug bsgo bya sbed pa dang // sngags pa zhags thogs yongs gcod pa //
analyzed: bran dang 'bangs dang g-yog po dang // gla mi dang ni tsi tra ka / mngag gzhug bsgo bya sbed pa dang // sngags pa zhags thogs yongs gcod pa //
translated: and mantra, and noose, and determined.🔽Paropajīva, and cālū,

original: gzhan sos dang ni tsallu dang // gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyi skyong //
analyzed: gzhan sos dang ni tsallu dang // gzhan skyes pa dang gzhan gyi skyong //
translated: paraja, and parāśraya.

original: lushn'a mtshams 'khyogs mantha ra //
analyzed: lushn'a mtshams 'khyogs mantha ra //
translated: Luṣṇā, and kuñjara, and manthara.

original: nges bzo dang ni bems po'o //
analyzed: nges bzo dang ni bems po'o //
translated: Niścita, and jaḍa.

original: tha shal lto 'gengs sh'i ta ka /
analyzed: tha shal lto 'gengs sh'i ta ka /
translated: Śāṭhya, and pūtikāya,

original: 'dar ba lan glan le lo can //
analyzed: 'dar ba lan glan le lo can //
translated: trembling, and pratyarthika, and lazy.🔽Naked, and deceitful, and wise,

original: sgren po khram pa mkhas pa dang // gsal po drung po spyang po'o //
analyzed: sgren po khram pa mkhas pa dang // gsal po drung po spyang po'o //
translated: and clear, and upright, and clever.

original: gtum po gdol pa mtho ris so //
analyzed: gtum po gdol pa mtho ris so //
translated: Fierce, and caṇḍāla, and svarga.

original: sdig can gsong por 'gro byed dang // nges 'jigs byed dang ma tam ga //
analyzed: sdig can gsong por 'gro byed dang // nges 'jigs byed dang ma tam ga //
translated: The sinful, the honest, the one who goes, the one who is certain, the one who terrifies, the one who is naked,

original: ngan thabs can dang nyal med pa //
analyzed: ngan thabs can dang nyal med pa //
translated: the one who is deceitful, the one who is without sleep,

original: mthar gnas dang ni mi 'dod pa //🔽dbye ba mon pa ri khrod pa //
analyzed: mthar gnas dang ni mi 'dod pa // dbye ba mon pa ri khrod pa //
translated: the one who dwells at the end, the one who is not desired,

original: shin @152a * //
analyzed: shin @152a * //
translated: the one who is divided, the one who is a Mon, the one who is a hermit,

original: shun pa ni kla klo skyes //🔽chom po rkun ma rkun po dang // srang ba sha dim ta mdog can //🔽jag pa gzhan rku aar pa dang // rku jag chom rkun 'jab bu ba //
analyzed: shun pa ni kla klo skyes // chom po rkun ma rkun po dang // srang ba sha dim ta mdog can // jag pa gzhan rku aar pa dang // rku jag chom rkun 'jab bu ba //
translated: the one who is a hunter, the one who is a barbarian,🔽the one who is a thief, the one who is a robber, the one who is a pickpocket, the one who is a swindler,🔽the one who is a bandit, the one who is a thief, the one who is a robber, the one who is a thief and robber, the one who is a pickpocket,

original: yangs 'phyag so sor rku byed do //
analyzed: yangs 'phyag so sor rku byed do //
translated: the one who is a thief, the one who is a thief of each,

original: bum pa can 'gebs skyes bu 'gebs //
analyzed: bum pa can 'gebs skyes bu 'gebs //
translated: the one who is a pot-bearer, the one who is a covered man,

original: mtshams kyi byed po 'og tu rgyu //
analyzed: mtshams kyi byed po 'og tu rgyu //
translated: the one who is a boundary-maker, the one who goes below,

original: su rungga sbrul me tog can //
analyzed: su rungga sbrul me tog can //
translated: the one who is a snake, the one who is a flower,

original: sa yi chu bag zhes pa dang // 'og gi su rungga dhoor //
analyzed: sa yi chu bag zhes pa dang // 'og gi su rungga dhoor //
translated: the one who is called the moisture of the earth, the one who is below, the one who is a dhōra,

original: rnam sgrogs dang ni di nda ka / rab chags chom rkun tsi lla mla //
analyzed: rnam sgrogs dang ni di nda ka / rab chags chom rkun tsi lla mla //
translated: the one who is proclaimed, the one who is a dinanda, the one who is greatly attached, the one who is a thief, the one who is a cilla,

original: phyag 'tshal sgra dang m'a ba la //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal sgra dang m'a ba la //
translated: the one who is a salutation, the one who is a sound, the one who is a mavala,

original: phyag byed pa dang de bshad dang // pa r'angguta dung gi sgra //
analyzed: phyag byed pa dang de bshad dang // pa r'angguta dung gi sgra //
translated: the one who is a prostrator, the one who is an explainer, the one who is a parāṅgatu, the one who is a conch-sound,

original: snyan ngag chom rkun zla ba'i rdul //
analyzed: snyan ngag chom rkun zla ba'i rdul //
translated: The Moon's Dust of the Bandit of Poetry.🔽kapa

original: ka pra / bcang bya /🔽rko byed do //
analyzed: ka pra / bcang bya / rko byed do //
translated: means 'to dig', 'to dig out', 'to dig up'.

original: sa rungga mtshams de dbye ba //
analyzed: sa rungga mtshams de dbye ba //
translated: The border is divided.

original: dpal be'u ba lang kha sogs //
analyzed: dpal be'u ba lang kha sogs //
translated: The auspicious knot, the cow's mouth, and so forth.

original: na shti sti s'u tra no shto //
analyzed: na shti sti s'u tra no shto //
translated: The Sutra of the Six Enemies.🔽The thief, the stolen goods, the bandit, the one with stolen goods,

original: rkun nor rkun rdzas chom rkun can //🔽rku bya zhes bya chom rkun la //
analyzed: rkun nor rkun rdzas chom rkun can // rku bya zhes bya chom rkun la //
translated: the one to be stolen, the bandit.🔽Some say 'bound'.

original: bcings ba zhes ni kha cig go / khyi dang s'a ra me ya dang // ser skya dang ni ri dags za //
analyzed: bcings ba zhes ni kha cig go / khyi dang s'a ra me ya dang // ser skya dang ni ri dags za //
translated: The dog, the cat, the mongoose, the yellow one, the deer,🔽the Shvanaka, the parrot,

original: shu na ka dang smra byed dang // shr'a dang / aintra man dang // 'dod can dkyil 'khor ring po dang // rab dga' banta /
analyzed: shu na ka dang smra byed dang // shr'a dang / aintra man dang // 'dod can dkyil 'khor ring po dang // rab dga' banta /
translated: the Shraddha, the Indra, the mandala, the long one, the very joyful one,

original: dar dang // koo me su ka n'a li ha //
analyzed: dar dang // koo me su ka n'a li ha //

original: tsa nydzu ri dang tinti d'i //
analyzed: tsa nydzu ri dang tinti d'i //
translated: Cāṇḍāla, and Tiṇṭīkarṇa,

original: srog chags skugs sho rgyal zhes bya //
analyzed: srog chags skugs sho rgyal zhes bya //
translated: are called the animals Kṛkara and Śaṅkara.

original: don can ba ta tstshi ddha nna //
analyzed: don can ba ta tstshi ddha nna //
translated: The one with the meaning of “having faith” is vadha,

original: dza du pu t'a k'a yin no //
analyzed: dza du pu t'a k'a yin no //
translated: and the one with the meaning of “having a body” is jātī.

original: tvanma b'i k'a tsho lo'i dpya //
analyzed: tvanma b'i k'a tsho lo'i dpya //
translated: The one with the meaning of “having a house” is bhavana,

original: lnga gcig ka ni ka rnams mtshungs //
analyzed: lnga gcig ka ni ka rnams mtshungs //
translated: and the one with the meaning of “having five” is pañca.

original: cho lo ston pa byi ba'i rna //
analyzed: cho lo ston pa byi ba'i rna //
translated: The one with the meaning of “having a dice” is akṣa,

original: kurbi kanta sna can no //
analyzed: kurbi kanta sna can no //
translated: and the one with the meaning of “having a nose” is kurbak.

original: rtags kyi phreng bar ci brjod pa //
analyzed: rtags kyi phreng bar ci brjod pa //
translated: Whatever is said in the garland of signs,

analyzed: de nas chos gzhan la yang 'jug / gang dang gang du bstan gyur pa'i //

original: sgra yi sbyor ba rnam rtogs bya //
analyzed: sgra yi sbyor ba rnam rtogs bya //

original: zhes pa dmangs rigs kyi sde rdzogs so /
analyzed: zhes pa dmangs rigs kyi sde rdzogs so /

original: // / legs byas pa ni bsod nams ldan //
analyzed: // / legs byas pa ni bsod nams ldan //

analyzed: yid 'ong dang ni snying po ldan /

original: 4 /'dod pa dang ni 'dod dang ldan /
analyzed: 4 /'dod pa dang ni 'dod dang ldan /

original: shes ldan dang ni go ba can //

analyzed: blo chud zos dang sems myos pa //
translated: Mind that is lost, and mind that is intoxicated,

original: sotkanthi dang au d+kanthi //

original: shes ldan rgya cher grags pa can //
analyzed: shes ldan rgya cher grags pa can //

original: rigs ldan rnam shes rnam par thos //
analyzed: rigs ldan rnam shes rnam par thos //

original: rab tu gnas dang rab zhan 'dod //
analyzed: rab tu gnas dang rab zhan 'dod //

original: gzhol dang kun tu chags pa mtshungs //
analyzed: gzhol dang kun tu chags pa mtshungs //

original: n'i ra pa dang pandi ra //
analyzed: n'i ra pa dang pandi ra //

original: 'dren pa / mgo dpon dang // jo bo mnga' bdag dpon po dang // lhag par 'phel dang chen por skye //
analyzed: 'dren pa / mgo dpon dang // jo bo mnga' bdag dpon po dang // lhag par 'phel dang chen por skye //
translated: and especially, increase, and great growth.

original: grong khyer rtsed byed tstsha gi lu'o //
analyzed: grong khyer rtsed byed tstsha gi lu'o //
translated: The city, the play, and the Cāgin.🔽The Śiva, the Viṣṇu, the Jñānin, the Vāyavīya, the Kaṭhin,

original: shi dge bi dashtsa sha tya dznya bya l'i katstsha ka / n'a ga di /
analyzed: shi dge bi dashtsa sha tya dznya bya l'i katstsha ka / n'a ga di /
translated: the Nāga, the Di,

original: bhu dza ga bhringga langga shtsa ta ra la shtsa pa de ba ka: tsanggo bee shy'a pa tri shts'a thabha bi li tstsha la ro bi ta:/
analyzed: bhu dza ga bhringga langga shtsa ta ra la shtsa pa de ba ka: tsanggo bee shy'a pa tri shts'a thabha bi li tstsha la ro bi ta:/
translated: the Bhuja, the Gṛiṅga, the Laṅga, the Śata, the Tara, the La, the Śa, the Padeva, the Ka, the Caṅgo, the Vaiśya, the Pātri, the Ṣaṭha, the Bhavi, the Liṭṭha, the La, the Ro, the Vitaḥ,

original: 3 / khye'u rtse dang gnas 'joms dang // 'dod pa'i rtsed mo rnam sun 'byin //
analyzed: 3 / khye'u rtse dang gnas 'joms dang // 'dod pa'i rtsed mo rnam sun 'byin //
translated: The boy, the play, the destruction of the abode, and the disgust of the play of desire.

original: bho lo pe lu ha la shtsee ba be la sa bi bh'a wa li se /
analyzed: bho lo pe lu ha la shtsee ba be la sa bi bh'a wa li se /
translated: The Bholopa, the Luhalśce, the Valasa, the Vibhāvalin,

original: la te ba grokti ra ti ro tstsha k'a latstshe ki l'a bu bhoo //
analyzed: la te ba grokti ra ti ro tstsha k'a latstshe ki l'a bu bhoo //
translated: the Lata, the Vagra, the Ratir, the Rochaka, the Laṭṭhaka, the Ki, the Lava, the Bhoja,

original: yan lag mchog dang gzugs ldan dang // lus mdzes pa dang sdu gu'o //
analyzed: yan lag mchog dang gzugs ldan dang // lus mdzes pa dang sdu gu'o //
translated: The excellent limb, the beautiful form, the beautiful body, and the handsome.

original: srung ma nyug rum nyams pa dang // 'og med dang ni khyim khol po //
analyzed: srung ma nyug rum nyams pa dang // 'og med dang ni khyim khol po //
translated: The protector, the eunuch, the fallen, the without lower garment, the servant,🔽and the slave.

original: ngas byed bya ba byed pa dang // gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ngas byed bya ba byed pa dang // gzhungs byed 'grus par byed pa'o //
translated: The one who acts is the agent, the one who causes to act is the instigator.

original: smra mi shes dang lkugs pa'o //
analyzed: smra mi shes dang lkugs pa'o //
translated: The one who does not speak is the mute.

original: yid la gcags dang pha bcas dang ; / pha yi chos ldan pa dang 'dra //
analyzed: yid la gcags dang pha bcas dang ; / pha yi chos ldan pa dang 'dra //
translated: The one who is remorseful is the one who has a father, the one who has a father's qualities.

original: pha lta bu dang gnas bya'o //
analyzed: pha lta bu dang gnas bya'o //
translated: The one who is like a father is the one who should be respected.

original: dga' bas brgyan bya bu mo dang // gang zhig sbyin byed lan cig 'gro //
analyzed: dga' bas brgyan bya bu mo dang // gang zhig sbyin byed lan cig 'gro //
translated: The one who is adorned with joy is the daughter, the one who goes once is the one who gives.

original: de la pha rol son pa dang // 'dod don brtson dang brtson 'grus can //🔽byams dang / mnyes gshin mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de la pha rol son pa dang // 'dod don brtson dang brtson 'grus can // byams dang / mnyes gshin mtshungs pa'o //
translated: The one who has gone beyond is the one who strives for the desired goal, the one who is diligent.🔽The one who is equal to love and affection is the one who is similar.

original: mdza' @154b ldan mdza' dang gces par 'dzin //
analyzed: mdza' @154b ldan mdza' dang gces par 'dzin //
translated: The one who is dear and cherished is the friend.

original: dge ldan / bde ldan bde 'byung dang // dge gsum pa dang yan lag ldan //
analyzed: dge ldan / bde ldan bde 'byung dang // dge gsum pa dang yan lag ldan //
translated: The one who has virtue, the one who has happiness, the one who has the source of happiness, the one who has three virtues, the one who has limbs,

original: nga ldan nga rgyal ldan pa dang // nga rgyal byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: nga ldan nga rgyal ldan pa dang // nga rgyal byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: The one who has self, the one who has pride, the one who acts with pride.

original: rang rgyud / rang dbang /
analyzed: rang rgyud / rang dbang /
translated: The one with self-continuum, the one with self-power,

original: rang bdag can //
analyzed: rang bdag can //
translated: The one with self-lord,

original: rang dga' gzhan gyis ma bzung ba ;
analyzed: rang dga' gzhan gyis ma bzung ba ;
translated: The one who is self-pleased and not held by others,

original: / sred bcas de ni ci 'dod can //
analyzed: / sred bcas de ni ci 'dod can //
translated: The one with craving is the one who desires whatever.

original: khri la 'phye dang rdul can no //
analyzed: khri la 'phye dang rdul can no //
translated: The one on the throne is the one with leprosy and dust.

original: gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang //
analyzed: gzhan rgyud gzhan dbang pha rol dbang //
translated: The other-dependent is the other's continuum.

original: rang dbang med dang bdag dbang med //🔽rang dbang med par 'dzin pa can //
analyzed: rang dbang med dang bdag dbang med // rang dbang med par 'dzin pa can //
translated: The powerless and the powerless with respect to self🔽are the powerless and the powerless with respect to others.

original: rang dbang med dang gzhan dbang can //
analyzed: rang dbang med dang gzhan dbang can //
translated: The powerless and the powerless with respect to others

original: gzhan gyis zin par de brjod do ;
analyzed: gzhan gyis zin par de brjod do ;
translated: are said to be those who are seized by others.

original: / gang zhig bud med skyes pa yi //
analyzed: / gang zhig bud med skyes pa yi //
translated: The one who knows the signs of woman and man

original: mtshan ma rig byed rgya mtsho pa //
analyzed: mtshan ma rig byed rgya mtsho pa //
translated: is the ocean of knowledge.🔽The one who wounds the wound, who hits the vital point,

original: rma gzir ba dang gnad la reg / gnad du phog dang gnad 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: rma gzir ba dang gnad la reg / gnad du phog dang gnad 'byed pa'o //
translated: who hits the vital point, and who splits the vital point.

original: 'brel pa can dang yon tan ldan //🔽ldan dang bya ldan las la brtson //
analyzed: 'brel pa can dang yon tan ldan // ldan dang bya ldan las la brtson //
translated: The one with a connection, the one with qualities,🔽the one with possession, the one with action, the one diligent in action,

original: las bzod las nus las su rung //
analyzed: las bzod las nus las su rung //
translated: the one who endures action, the one able in action, the one fit for action,

original: las la nus pa ldan pa'o //
analyzed: las la nus pa ldan pa'o //
translated: and the one with the power of action.

original: las kyi ngang tshul las la bzang //
analyzed: las kyi ngang tshul las la bzang //
translated: The one of the nature of action, the one good in action,

original: las la dpa' dang mgo thon byed //
analyzed: las la dpa' dang mgo thon byed //
translated: the one heroic in action, and the one who performs.🔽The one who is paid, the one who works,

original: gla zan dang ni las byed dang // las mkhan de yi bya ba'o //
analyzed: gla zan dang ni las byed dang // las mkhan de yi bya ba'o //
translated: and the one who acts, that is his action.

original: phyag ma dang ni mang pos byed //
analyzed: phyag ma dang ni mang pos byed //
translated: The one with many hands, the one with many,

original: yun ring thogs dang ring du byed //
analyzed: yun ring thogs dang ring du byed //
translated: the one who takes a long time, and the one who does for a long time.

original: skye bo'i bya ba grong ldan dang // grong bya grong dang ldan pa'o //🔽'dres par spyod dang ci 'grub byed //
analyzed: skye bo'i bya ba grong ldan dang // grong bya grong dang ldan pa'o // 'dres par spyod dang ci 'grub byed //
translated: The activities of people are the activities of the city-dwellers and the activities of the country-dwellers.🔽The activities of the city-dwellers are the activities of the mixed life and the activities of the life of success.
